title: The Great Tribulation Survive the Book of Revelation
description: EVERYTHING is about to CHANGE. NOTHING will ever be the SAME. Will you be ready? The prophesies contained in the Book of Revelation are being fulfilled today. Find out what God has been revealing to His modern prophets about the coming days. Brother Dave has researched the best contemporary prophetic voices and messages to bring the reader a fascinating and practical guide to surviving the next few years. What readers are saying: "Wow! Truth is scarier than fiction" James D. "Intelligent, insightful, engossing and impossible to put down" William H.
author: David M. Goudie
